Great game.! Wish it could be longer, or twice longer,,,
Great game, I've played it before but decieded to buy it on pc, beat the game in about 1 hr and 30 min. Highly Reconmend :)
This game was pretty interesting. I would recommend if you like puzzle games. And I really loved the story of this game.

Portal is probably one of the best games that I have played in my whole life. Everything about it is too perfect: The atmosphere is intriguing and eerie, the dialogues are very well written, the ost gives the perfect sensation of loneliness and mystery.
 The gameplay is innovative and fun, and it's incredibly designed. It's a really perfect game, the only flaw that it have it's that is very short.
  But in the steam sales, it cost like 0,99$, play it if you haven't played it before!
Neat little game, everything looks nice, no glitches, humor was spot on. No complaints, certainly worth 3 hours of your time since its cheap

Timeless classic! - 9/10

If you like puzzle, sci-fi or futuristic games, then this is right up your alley.

Pros:
- Innovative mechanics (use of portals)
- Interesting puzzles
- Sci-Fi atmosphere & themes
- Futuristic techno soundtrack that conveys a sense of loneliness and isolation
- Antagonist GLaDOS

Cons:
- Short (about 3hr long)
- Little to no character development









P.S 
[b] THE CAKE IS A LIE [/b]
Try brain training with lots of fun! Don't be sad when you don't get the solution straight away.

A classic, and awesome game.
Quite simple and short however. Play this one, and Portal 2 as well!
Although it is an old game but the plot is totally worth it ! So glad i bought both portals as it let my mind get cracking. Indeed the awards were not just for show

even tho its old, still a clasic!
is there ever going to be a portal 3?

This game is fantastic, it revolutionized puzzle games. If you're gonna buy this game, i suggest you buy it during a sale, because this game can be finished within an hour. This game is amazing, but too short for a 10 euro game.

The campagin is +- 1 hour. I have 8 hours on this game.

It's ok xp
Gra logiczna z ciekawƒÖ historiƒÖ w tle. Przej≈õcie kampani nie nastrƒôcza wiƒôkszych trudno≈õci - dopiero windowanie wynik√≥w na odznaki jest problematyczne.

Fantastic and short problem solving game. Easily worth the fair 10 dollar price. The puzzles are not overly frustrating or complicated, and there are premade challenge stages to test your skill further. It leaves you wanting more.
I'm gonna try to resume in one word: astounding!
Cuando yo muera este juego seguir√° vivo.

Short game, but worth every penny. Played it once on Xbox 360 a few years ago and I just got it in the portal bundle for next to nothing. Regardless, even at it's original price, it's worth every penny. If you haven't played it yet, I strongly recommend you get on that now at a discount.

Old and short, Portal makes it to my "Top Ten Evah" list without breaking a sweat. A nice and fun (if often too easy) adventure for an evening, with memorable characters (well, character) and quite a bunch of laughs, it can easily turn into a keyboard-crashing, rage-inducing hell of a challenge - if you wish it to go there. Personally, I loved both of this Janus' faces. Worth every penny and every minute spent.
Short and sweet, with unexpectedly entertaining opponents. Good for casual gaming and a few laughs.
Bardzo dobra gra logiczna, jednak trochƒô za kr√≥tka

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here:
HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE

Still a lie.

1/10 - IGN.






PS: If you haven't finished this game yet by now you should just kill yourself already. Uninstall Steam pls. You don't belong here.

So GLaD I bought this.
Truly a historical game! 
Worth every cent.

El mero hecho de poner un portal lejisimos y luego ver que el mapa sigue cargando ese terreno a gran distancia hace que valga la pena el juego, es muy corto, si, pero con esa rebaja quien se resiste a comprarlo.

Aparte es super divertido e intuitivo, muy recomendado ;D

Portal is One of the Best Puzzle game available in Steam.....,

Fun and Engaging and nice AI which will help u to [strike][b]survive[/b][/strike]

And Remember  [b]"There is no Cake"[/b].

"Higly Recommended"
Hole in the wall but the prize is cake and you got fucking pranked.
Sehr gutes Spiel jedoch viel zu kurz. 9/10
